welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Riverview, Canada! Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a memorable stay here.

restaurants.name: Zorba's Coney Island
restaurants.description: Zorba's Coney Island is a diner located in Riverview.
restaurants.address: 18237 Fort St (btwn Sibley & Pennsylvania), Riverview, MI 48193

restaurants.name: Parthenon Coney Island & Family Restaurant
restaurants.description: Parthenon Coney Island & Family Restaurant is a greek restaurant located in Riverview.

restaurants.name: Chopstick Inn
restaurants.description: Chopstick Inn is a chinese restaurant located in Riverview.

restaurants.name: Sibley Gardens
restaurants.description: Sibley Gardens is a italian restaurant located in Trenton.

restaurants.name: Sonic Drive-In
restaurants.description: Sonic Drive-In is a fast food restaurant located in Southgate.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Moncton International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Moncton International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
